keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fair benefits with a new £12,500 personal income tax allowance and benefits staying capped.
Access to high quality health and social care, with an increase in health spending and GP practices open 7 days a week.
Supporting job creation in our area, with Liverpool at the heart of the Conservatives' Northern Powerhouse vision.

issues.economy: Low taxes and fair benefits with a new £12,500 personal income tax allowance and benefits staying capped.
issues.health: Access to high quality health and social care, with an increase in health spending and GP practices open 7 days a week.
